Module com.bd
Package controller

Class UpdateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The UpdateCustomerController is used to update customer information in the database.
Author:
Brandi Davis

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the UpdateCustomerController. Disables the customer ID field Populates the country and division combo boxes
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for root object
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Navigates to the ViewCustomersController when OK is selected on the dialog prompt. Canceling will stay on the current page
      Parameters:
      event - on action cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader in the event of an error loading the ViewCustomersController

    • onActionCountrySelected

      void onActionCountrySelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Generates First Level Divisions of the selected Country in the Country combo box. Uses the selectDivisionFromCountry() method from the FirstLevelDivisionsDao to query the First Level Divisions of the selected Country
      Parameters:
      event - on action country selected from combo box

    • onActionUpdateCustomer

      void onActionUpdateCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Updates the customer information in the database. There is an error check for any empty fields when attempting to submit the customer information Navigates to the ViewCustomersController on success
      Parameters:
      event - on action update customer button

    • sendCustomer

      public void sendCustomer(Customers customer) throws SQLException
      Sends the selected customer information from the ViewCustomersController to the Update Customer Screen.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer that will be sent to the Update Customer Screen
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of getting an error when attempting to get the selected Country ID from the First Level Division
